title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: New Vestroia (Bakugan: New Vestroia)
synopsis: After the final downfall of the rogue Bakugan Naga, peace was brought back to Vestroia. With the help of Danma Kuusou, his companion Pyrus Dragonoid, and other Battle Brawlers, the Infinity and Silent Cores were combined and the realm was recreated.
related_anime: ['Bakugan Battle Brawlers', 'Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders']
